title: LG 36in Electric Cooktop LSCE365ST Tour
description:
In this video we're showing the 36" LG LSCE365 in a stainless steel finish.  Check out our entire lineup of electric cooktops at Abt.com: http://www.abt.com/category/464/Electric-Cooktops.html?utm_source=youtube&utm_campaign=LSCE365ST_20170119&utm_medium=video 

Features:
- Cooking Surface: Radiant
- Cooktop Type: Electric
- Studio Series: Yes
- Surface Width: 36"
- Number of Elements: 5
- SmoothTouch™ Controls: Yes
- Bridge Element: Yes
- Steady Heat Technology: Yes
- Color/Trim: Black / Stainless Steel
- Elements Material: Ceramic Glass
- Hot Surface Indicator: Yes
- Warm Function: Yes
- Child Lock: Yes
- Auto Shut Off: Yes
- Power Boost: No
- Element Size and Wattage: 
       12", 9", 6" / 3.0, 2.2, 1.1kW (Triple)
        9", 6" / 3.0, 1.4kW (Dual)
        7" / 1.8kW + 0.8kW (Bridge)
        6" / 0.1kW (Warm)
